alert.note: Alert for Alger (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 27 at 5:31PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Upper Michigan, including the following county, Alger. * WHEN...Until 330 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Several private residences in danger of flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 529 PM EST, Local law enforcement reported an ice jam near the advisory area. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Au Train. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Report observed flooding to the National Weather Service in Marquette and local emergency services when you can do so safely.
